activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12740
activity.text:
@Harishgouda06022004 @rithviknishad Can you assign me this issue

**Proposed Solution**

-  Use a unique value for each CommandItem, specifically the user.id, which ensures that each entry behaves independently regardless of display name.

**ETA:** 1 day from assignment

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12736
activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 @rithviknishad I would like to work on the issue

Proposed Solution:

- Replace the native <select> in the user profile language selector with ShadCN's Select component to maintain consistency with the design system. This will involve importing ShadCN Select, updating the JSX structure, ensuring language switching still works via i18next, and preserving existing className props for styling.

ETA: 1 Day from assignment
